author: Gunter Wambaugh <gunter.wambaugh@gmail.com>
name: minecraft-advancement-tracker
description: Track progress on advancements in Minecraft: Java Edition

scripts.start: echo Remember to set default in Cargo.toml && rimraf dist crate/pkg crate/target && cross-env WASM_PACK_PROFILE=dev parcel web/index.html
scripts.build: rimraf dist crate/pkg crate/target && cross-env WASM_PACK_PROFILE=release parcel build --public-url . web/index.html
